entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 04:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -22.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -30.9°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
